oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Castro Rodríguez, Marta
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The main problem the project is to find the correct solution for 3D communication between the user and the machine The student has to design the devices needed to a correct communication between the Wii console and the user. It is 3D glasses with movement detector, gloves with detectors and a stand for the Wii remote.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Universidad de Zaragoza; Departamento de Ingeniería de Diseño y Fabricación
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ingeniero Técnico en Diseño Industrial
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development of 3D communication
